Articles.Content: I’ve heard of the many bugs and problems people had with KSP on console in the past I was just wondering if some of those problems might have got fixed or acknowledged by 2018 and if it’s worth purchasing the console version.

Moving to KSP Discussion.

Also, welcome to the forums!

Personally, if you have access to decent pc or know that you soon will have, then not really, because pc editions offers the same and so much more than console edition (and I'm not even talking about modding community, just pure game)

But if you have only a console and want to Kerbal so much, then go for it
just keep in mind the weak CPU consoles have really limit what you can build before the game lags real hard

I originally tried the game on the Xbox a couple months ago and thought the user control scheme was extremely awkward but the game seemed really interesting. I found that it was a port from a PC game and tried that on a 5 year old laptop an loved it on the PC. Then I found the mod community. My Xbox hasn't been turned on since early June.
